update: So I guess this is a big update because I redid the entire site. It's <rainbow-text>BRAND SPANKING NEW, BABY</rainbow-text>. Heck yeah. I'm still working on some pages, so there may some dead links in the menu.
Added my 1990s website history. Its not complete, but its a start. Also updated some links in the nav menu. And I added a guestbook.

Updated the menu to be expandable. Added a shrine section. No content yet though! Added a commonplace book. But also not much content there yet. Added a blog, which is an RSS feed of my dreamwidth journal.
Completely redid the site so it looks prettier. Added a gingham background (css) and some pics, redid the layout. Looks much better now imo! Also working on a few pages that are not complete
Finished my A24 (movie stuff) page. Updated the 'What I use (about) page. Updated the links page. Added a Cozy Fantasy/Sci-Fi page (book stuff).
New layout! changed the guestbook to atabook, added a page about Vampire Resource Management, fixed a bunch of things.
Livejournal/Dreamwidth stuff: Added a 100x100 icon archive of the icons I have made over the years, a page of friends only banners, and a mood theme.
added a lexicon/book of words with some cool words that I like in it. Fixed a few things behind the scenes.
moved the navigation from a sidebar to a top nav. also got rid of some pages I wasn't happy with. they may come back later. they may not.

added the noAI webring to the front page. readded my about and use pages. fixed a few things. Added a new theme (blue), added my fav movies page back, added a links page, updated the A24 challenge page
Updated the links page with some new sites in most categories! check them out! Also joined the TF2 webring.

Added a dyslexic theme. I hope this works, feel free to let me know if its not right. tidied up my code a little bit. Started making my site a little more accessible. LOTS of work still to go. Moved the shinies page under "stuff" in the menu. Added some links to the links page
Rearranged some pages and cleaned up my css a lot. also added a cook book! Only a few recipes for now and no images, but more to come!

updated my A24 list with some movies I saw and made it look better. Added a Webmeji to the front page. Added some new quotes to the generator. Added a page for my favourite characters in fandom section, added some stamps to the shinies page. Added a youtube section to the links page

Added some seen movies to A24 challenge, added a favourite music page, added a favourite movies page. Added a solo TTRPG page, and a gaming journal for the Koriko Solo Journalling TTRPG, and for 5-min-machine. Redid my book log so it no longer relies on goodreads widgets. Added some seen movies to the A24 challenge page.

Added a commonplace book, changed the reading log, fav music and fav movie pages so they are filterable. Added a modal/popup for images on commonplace book page. Updated the site credits page and the sitemap. Added a few song to favourite music. Added 2019, 2018 and 2017 to my reading log. Also worked on validating my code and I think I was successful!

Changed the nav menu to a sidebar, as the top menu with hover dropdowns wasn't at all accessible and it was bothering me. Not sure I like the sidebar, it feels like the page is a bit crowded with it, but for now it will do. Also removed a few pages that I wasn't happy with to redo them. Am planning to redo the colour scheme as the contrast isn't strong enough, not sure what colours to do though!
Added some blog posts! thats it. nothing exciting.
